tasks.label: Compilar LaTeX
args: if (Get-Command pdflatex -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { pdflatex -interaction=nonstopmode documentation.tex } elseif (Get-Command xelatex -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { xelatex -interaction=nonstopmode documentation.tex } elseif (Get-Command lualatex -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { lualatex -interaction=nonstopmode documentation.tex } else { Write-Host 'No se encontró un compilador de LaTeX. Por favor instala MiKTeX o TeX Live.'; Write-Host 'Puedes descargar MiKTeX desde: https://miktex.org/download'; Write-Host 'O TeX Live desde: https://tug.org/texlive/'; exit 1 }

tasks.label: Compilar LaTeX (completo)
args: if (Get-Command pdflatex -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { pdflatex -interaction=nonstopmode documentation.tex; pdflatex -interaction=nonstopmode documentation.tex } else { Write-Host 'Error: No se encontró pdflatex'; exit 1 }
